page.title: 26Retail Trade
page.content:
Hucknall Market has been held on Fridays since 1874, with a Thursday “bargain market” in recent times, offering space for 56 stalls. As well as long-established local traders, the town has branches of many national chains: Wilkinson, B&M, Boots, Bon Marche, Holland and Barrett, Specsavers, Peacocks, Greggs, Yeomans and Argos among them. There are also many charity shops, pubs, banks and estate agents. Tesco built a supermarket on No.2 Pit site in 2003 and expanded it to a Tesco Extra in 2008.
David Heathcote
